content: make a little sunshine with this sweet free pattern use as an applique or make 2 and sew together to use on a gorgeous mobile can also be stuffed as a 3d shape it measures approx 2 wide x 2 high when made using dk weight yarn you can substitute with aran/worsted weight and it will be just a little bigger it uses just a small amount of cotton so is perfect for using up scrap yarn it s an easy pattern but can be a little fiddly in making the triangles if you don t have much crochet experience photos of each stage are there to guide you you will need knowledge of how to do the basic stitches of chain slip_stitch single_crochet and half_double_crochet and also how to do a magic_ring this style is perfect for a hanging decoration if you make 2 and sew together both sides will be the same it pairs beautifully with my rainbow pattern and a sweet cloud is coming very soon too together they make a really gorgeous mobile or window/wall hanging i d love to see your finished suns please add your projects on ravelry and tag me @thecraftytherapist or use the tag #thecraftytherapist have fun making please do not copy and redistribute the pattern or photos but sharing links to this listing or directly to the pattern is very much appreciated thank you love jan xx
